SELECT DISTINCT b.ISBN, b.BOOK_TITLE, b.PUBLISHER, b.PUB_DATE, LISTAGG(ba.AUTHOR, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ba.AUTHOR) AS authors FROM book b JOIN book_author ba ON b.ISBN = ba.ISBN WHERE
b.BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{book_title} || '%' AND
ba.AUTHOR LIKE '%' || #{authors} || '%' AND
b.PUBLISHER LIKE '%' || #{publisher} || '%' AND
b.PUB_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{pub_date_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND b.PUB_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{pub_date_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND
1=1 GROUP BY b.ISBN, b.BOOK_TITLE, b.PUBLISHER, b.PUB_DATE ORDER BY b.PUB_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.isbn, b.price, b.publisher, b.book_title, b.image_name, b.authors, rownum rn FROM ( SELECT b.isbn, b.price, b.publisher, b.book_title, b.image_name, LISTAGG(ba.author, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ba.author) AS authors FROM book b JOIN book_author ba ON b.isbn = ba.isbn WHERE b.isbn IN ( SELECT DISTINCT bc.isbn FROM book_categories bc JOIN categories c ON bc.cat_id = c.cat_id WHERE c.cat_id IN ( SELECT cat_id FROM categories WHERE parent_id IN ( SELECT cat_id FROM categories WHERE parent_id = #{cat_id} OR cat_id = #{cat_id} ) ) ) AND b.book_title LIKE '%' || #{book_title} || '%' GROUP BY b.isbn, b.price, b.publisher, b.book_title, b.image_name ORDER BY b.book_title ) b ) WHERE rn > #{start} AND rn < #{end}
